lead_paragraph: The race to secure automatic promotion to the Premier League could not be closer after Brighton's 3-1 victory at Charlton Athletic and Middlesbrough's 0-0 draw with Ipswich ensured both teams joined Burnley on 87 points with two games left.

headline.print_headline: Burnley, Boro, Brighton Locked Together in Promotion Race
headline.main: Burnley, Boro, Brighton Locked Together in Promotion Race

snippet: The race to secure automatic promotion to the Premier League could not be closer after Brighton's 3-1 victory at Charlton Athletic and Middlesbrough's 0-0 draw with Ipswich ensured both teams joined Burnley on 87 points with two games left....
